properties.areaDesc: South and Southeast Grand/West Central and Southwest Boulder/Gilpin/Clear Creek/Summit/North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet; Flat Tops; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys; South and East Jackson/Larimer/North and Northeast Grand/Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
properties.headline: Avalanche Warning issued February 6 at 1:51PM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE
COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER.

AVALANCHE WARNING FOR THE CAIC STEAMBOAT AND FLAT TOPS, FRONT
RANGE, and VAIL AND SUMMIT COUNTY ZONES

* TIMING...Beginning 5:00 PM Thursday February 6. Expires at 8:00 AM
Saturday February 8.

* AFFECTED AREA... Park Range... Flat Top Mountains...Elk Head
Mountains... Medicine Bow Mountains...Never Summer Mountains...
Front Range... Williams Fork Mountains... Ten Mile Range...and the
Gore Range.

* AVALANCHE DANGER...The avalanche danger is HIGH (Level 4 of 5).
Avalanches large enough to bury and kill a person are likely
Thursday night and through Friday. You can trigger avalanches from
the bottom of slopes or from a distance. If you trigger an
avalanche it will be large and very dangerous.

* REASON... Intense snowfall and strong winds will result in very
dangerous avalanche conditions.
properties.instruction:
is not recommended.

Consult www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information.

Lazar
